title: Admin / Virtual Assistant Needed for a Project
snippet:
I need to hire a data entry or virtual assistant to assist with a project.

Preference for the hire:

* US based
* A Parent of Younger Kids (2-10 years old)
* Will take on mundane task, but complete them in a timely manner

More details will be provided, but basically, you'll be going through an excel sheet and categorizing products based on specifications I provide.
